BonusBackgrounds.Description: Allows the selection of additional backgrounds.

BonusFeats.Description: Grants a bonus feat for each level that a feat is normally gained.

BonusMythicAbilities.Description: Grants a bonus mythic ability for each level. BREAKS THE UI

BonusMythicFeats.Description: Grants a bonus mythic feat for each level. BREAKS THE UI

OfflevelFeats.Description: Grants a bonus ability for each level that a feat is not normally gained.

OfflevelMythicAbilities.Description: Grants a bonus mythic ability for each level.

OfflevelMythicFeats.Description: Grants a bonus mythic feat for each level.

AdvancedProgressionClass.Description: Adds Advanced Progression class for adding to gestalt build.

NineTailsClass.Description: Adds a weird kitsune specific class.

ExtraBackground.Description: Adds Extra Background as a normal feat.

ExtraMythicAbility.Description: Adds Extra Mythic Ability as a normal feat.

ExtraMythicFeat.Description: Adds Extra Mythic Feat as a normal feat.
